schemaPath.description: Path to the schema. If using the --remote flag then you must specify a valid remote URL. If not you must specify a local file.
schemaPath.x-prompt: Schema path (URL to schema if using --remote):

remote.description: Specify whether you would like to fetch remotely.

configPath.description: path to the redocly config file responsible for auth. For more information: https://openapi-ts.dev/cli#auth.
